package.name: iMessages
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Author really likes the new Messages app, so he decided to port its theme to Adium.  The theme shows usernames and time stamps. iMessages has only two colors at the moment, but it will notify users of all future updates that will bring more color options.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=8259
